scene_description_enriched: A man and a woman are depicted riding a white horse in an outdoor setting. The woman, on the left, wears a red garment and a tall, pointed hat. The man, on the right, is dressed in a blue tunic and red hose, also wearing a hat. He holds a staff or a branch. The background consists of green foliage and a light blue sky. The scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
